info.title: Product
info.description: The service supports following operations: GET, POST, PUT, PATCH, DELETE. You can create, read, update, and delete product master data at the entity level.

x-sap-shortText: Create, read, update of the master data for products using this synchronous inbound service

values.text: IC Configure - Variant Configuration Bundle Model Integration (SAP_COM_0932)
[Opportunity-to-Order with SAP Cloud for Customer (1VP)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/1VP " Link To BP ")
[Standalone Manual Transportation Planning (6W5)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/6W5 " Link To BP ")
[Set Up Advanced Solution Bundle (6W9)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/6W9 " Link To BP ")

x-sap-extensible.description:
If you are working with key user extensibility, the API can be extended by custom fields on the following business contexts (field usage for this API needs to be selected):
* Warehouse Product: Storage Type Data (/SCWM/PRODUCT_STORAGETYPE_DATA)
* Warehouse Product: Warehouse Data (/SCWM/PRODUCT_WAREHOUSE_DATA)
* Master Data: Product General (PRODUCT)
* Master Data: Product Plant (PRODUCT_PLANT)
* Master Data: Product Distribution Chains (PRODUCT_SALES)
* Master Data: Product Storage Location (PRODUCT_STORAGELOC)
* Master Data: Product Dimensions (PRODUCT_UOM)
* Master Data: Product Valuation (PRODUCT_VALUATION)

[How to add an extension field to an API](https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_S4HANA_CLOUD/0f69f8fb28ac4bf48d2b57b9637e81fa/ce819b8557194ae0aa180ba4ac6a04de.html)
